Name: Purple Flame
SeedDescription: Plant them in fall. Take 8 days to produce a beautiful flower.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Sähen im Herbst. Es brauch 8 Tage Zeit, um eine schöne Blume zu produzieren.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter en automne. Il faudra 8 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью. Через 8 дней вырастает красивый пурпурный цветок.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 在秋天种植，需要8天长出美丽的花朵
